mapper.select: select iprofessor,imajor,nm name,gender,birthdate,phone,email,address from professor ORDER BY iprofessor DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{row}

SELECT A.lecture_str_date lectureStrDate, A.lecture_end_date lectureEndDate, A.lecture_str_time lectureStrTime, A.lecture_end_time lectureEndTime, A.opening_procedures openingProcedures, A.grade_limit gradeLimit, B.lecture_name lectureName, B.score, C.lecture_room_name lectureRoomName, C.max_capacity maxCapacity, D.day_week dayWeek, E.semester FROM lecture_applly A INNER JOIN lecture_name B ON A.ilecture_name = B.ilecture_name INNER JOIN lecture_room C ON A.ilecture_room = C.ilecture_room INNER JOIN lecture_day_week D ON A.ilecture = D.ilecture INNER JOIN semester E ON A.isemester = E.isemester WHERE A.iprofessor = #{iprofessor} AND A.opening_procedures = #{openingProcedures}

SELECT A.lecture_str_date lectureStrDate, A.lecture_end_date lectureEndDate, A.lecture_str_time lectureStrTime, A.lecture_end_time lectureEndTime, A.opening_procedures openingProcedures, A.grade_limit gradeLimit, B.lecture_name lectureName, B.score, C.lecture_room_name lectureRoomName, C.max_capacity maxCapacity, D.day_week dayWeek, E.semester FROM lecture_applly A INNER JOIN lecture_name B ON A.ilecture_name = B.ilecture_name INNER JOIN lecture_room C ON A.ilecture_room = C.ilecture_room INNER JOIN lecture_day_week D ON A.ilecture = D.ilecture INNER JOIN semester E ON A.isemester = E.isemester WHERE A.iprofessor = #{iprofessor}
